title: Birdie Buddy
resume:
Birdie Buddy is a South Korean television series set in the world of professional golf. Based on the 2007 comic series of the same title by Lee Hyun-sae, it starred Uee, Lee Yong-woo and Lee Da-hee.
The drama was pre-produced in 2010, and initially expected to air on MBC in December 2010, but the network decided not to give it a timeslot. After several postponements, it aired on cable channel tvN from August 8 to October 25, 2011 on Mondays and Tuesdays at 23:00. But instead of the original 20 episodes of 70 minutes each, it was re-edited into 24 episodes spanning 45 minutes each.

The drama was pre-produced in 2010, and initially expected to air on MBC in December 2010, but the network decided not to give it a timeslot.
